Room.Name: Main Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are traveling along Main Street, which runs north to south.
Room.LongDescription: Main Street continues to the north and south. To the north, you can see Overland Drive, a smaller access road which runs east to west. The Dragon Tooth Inn lies to the east, but it's entrance is on the north side of Hillcrest Drive. On the east side, you see a large building with an illuminated sign which reads "Chanteclaire Magical Supplies". There is a door on the building below the sign.
